course_title: First-Year Seminar in QTM: Using Data to Study Inequality
class_notes: This course will provide an introduction to recent scholarship and data tools for studying social inequalities by gender, race, class, sexuality, and other identities.
course_description: Variable first-year seminar topics within QTM which may aim to provide an introduction to quantitative theory, practical applications of quantitative methods, introductory coding or statistics, or introduce other topics pertinent to quantitative fields.
schedule_location: TTh 11:30am-12:45pm in New Psyc Bldg 561 (36 Eagle Ro
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4669, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: M. Reed, Status: Closed
